titleStmt.title: A description of a prerogative royal. Shevving how far a soveraigne may according to the VVord of God require service of his subjects by his prerogative. Also how far a subject is to give true obedience unto his soveraigne. By M: B. wishing happy prosperity unto the King, Parliament and kingdome.
titleStmt.author: M. B.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
